drillers.title: DRILLER'S METHOD
drillers.description: Two circulations: first to circulate kick out, second for kill mud
when: Time to prepare kill mud would allow excessive gas migration
Shoe integrity adequate for first circulation at original MW
cons: Higher casing pressure during first circulation

waitAndWeight.title: WAIT & WEIGHT METHOD
waitAndWeight.description: Single circulation with kill mud from start
when: Kill mud CAN be prepared in reasonable time
Shoe pressure is a concern (tight margins)
cons: Must wait for kill mud preparation

bullheading.title: BULLHEADING
bullheading.caution: May damage formation. Does not remove kick.

volumetric.title: VOLUMETRIC METHOD
volumetric.note: Does not kill well - controls situation only

decisionTree.title: QUICK DECISION GUIDE
steps: 1. Can you circulate? → If NO, consider Bullhead or Volumetric
2. Is kill mud ready now? → If YES, use Wait & Weight
3. Will delay cause gas migration concern? → If YES, use Driller's
4. Is shoe margin tight? → If YES, prefer Wait & Weight
5. Default: Driller's Method (simpler, can start immediately)
